biotools.summary: Match either a single name of a chemical compound or a whole list of names against reference databases, even when the notations are different. This matching is solely done on the name (string) basis of chemical compounds without identifying the exact chemical structure of the molecule described.

bioschemas.name: ChemHits
bioschemas.summary: Match either a single name of a chemical compound or a whole list of names against reference databases, even when the notations are different. This matching is solely done on the name (string) basis of chemical compounds without identifying the exact chemical structure of the molecule described.
